name: Přerov
airport_type: Public domestic aerodrome / Private international aerodrome
traffic: VFR day, VFR night (only for helicopters)
operating_hours: 1 APR   31 MAY  0700 1600 UTC, 1 JUN   30 SEP  0800 1700 UTC, 1 OCT   31 OCT  0700 1600 UTC, otherwise O/R 24 HR in advance. In case of arrivals/departures outside of the Schengen Area 48 HR O/R SAT, SUN, HOL.
fuel: JET A 1 (NATO F 34), AVGAS LL 100, outside of operational hours on request 24 HR in advance Shell W100, Shell mineral, Aeroshell 100, W15W50, TOTAL 100, D100 limited
